title: The organization
description: KoboToolbox started as a small project. Today, it is a fully independent NGO with professionals around the world. Learn more about us!

title: Our impact
description: We are more than the technology we provide. We are the positive change we enable through the many organizations we support. See how we are making a difference.

title: Our work
description: Our team of researchers, developers, designers and support specialists provides many services and participates in projects to further our cause. See what we have done.

title: Financials
description: Wondering how we manage to keep KoboToolbox free despie of the significant costs associated? Learn here how we do it, and how we plan to continue growing.

title: Events
description: Stay up to date about the latest events organized by KoboToolbox. From trainings to releases, everything in our calendar can be found here.

title: Meet the team
description: Did you ever wondered who are the faces behind KoboToolbox? Wonder no more! Meet our team of passionate researchers, developers, designers & support specialists!
